net.htmlparser.jericho

Interface Config.CharacterReferenceEncodingBehaviour

  • Enclosing class:
    Config

    public static interface Config.CharacterReferenceEncodingBehaviour
    Specifies the interface for defining character reference encoding behaviour.

    The default implementation Config.DEFAULT_CHARACTER_REFERENCE_ENCODING_BEHAVIOUR is suitable for the vast majority of circumstances, so this interface is almost never used directly.

    The currently active encoding behaviour is stored in the static Config.CurrentCharacterReferenceEncodingBehaviour property.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isEncoded(char ch, boolean insideAttributeValue)
      Determines whether the specified character is to be encoded in the specified context.

    • Method Detail

      • isEncoded

        boolean isEncoded(char ch,
                boolean insideAttributeValue)
        Determines whether the specified character is to be encoded in the specified context.
        Parameters:
        ch - the candidate character.
        insideAttributeValue - specifies whether the output must be valid inside a quoted attribute value.
        Returns:
        true if the specified character is to be encoded in the specified context, otherwise false.
